role.descr: agent, entity making something be longer
ext or tmp, by how much or until when

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Ingalls Shipbuilding Inc. , a division of Litton Industries Inc. , was given a $ 15.5 million extension on a contract for shipyard services .
example.arg: Ingalls Shipbuilding Inc. , a division of Litton Industries Inc. , ---> *-1
on a contract for shipyard services
